SEARCH
Package gw.api.geocode

Class CCGeocodeScriptHelper

java.lang.Object
gw.api.geocode.GeocodeScriptHelper
gw.api.geocode.CCGeocodeScriptHelper
public class CCGeocodeScriptHelper extends GeocodeScriptHelper
Provides utility functions for working with Proximity Searches (Geocoding) from Gosu, including ClaimCenter-specific methods.

  • Method Details

    • setupAssignmentProximitySearch

      public static CCAssignmentSearchCriteria setupAssignmentProximitySearch(Address searchCenter, Boolean isDistanceBased, Integer number, UnitOfDistance unitOfDistance)
      Sets up a proximity search on an Assignment Search (CC-specific, extends the User Search options).
      Parameters:
      searchCenter - The location to search for proximity from, an Address
      isDistanceBased - Set for true if a distance based ("search within n miles/km") search; false for an ordinal ("nearest n") search
      number - Range in miles/km for distance based searches; number of results to be returned for an ordinal search
      unitOfDistance - For distance based searches, indicates the unit to be used for the search range; for ordinal searches, indicates what unit should be used for results (UnitOfDistance.TC_KILOMETER or UnitOfDistance.TC_MILE)
      Returns:
      a CCAssignmentSearchCriteria upon which other criteria can be set if desired.
